data.title: Youkai Watch Jam: Youkai Gakuen Y - N to no Souguu
data.meta_description: Looking for information on the anime Youkai Watch Jam: Youkai Gakuen Y - N to no Souguu (Yo-kai Watch Jam: Yo-kai Academy Y)? Find out more with MyAnimeList, the world's most active online anime and manga community and database.

Characters & Voice Actors

Staff

Edit

Opening Theme

3: "Inishie Romantic (いにしえロマンティック)" by P Maru-sama. feat. YSP Club (P丸様。feat.YSPクラブ) (eps (eps 53-??)) 1: "Gingira Ginga (ギンギラ銀河)" by Strawberry Prince (すとぷり) (eps 1-28) 2: "Dai Uchuu Rendezvous (大宇宙ランデブー)" by Strawberry Prince (すとぷり) (eps 29-??)

Edit

Ending Theme

10: "Uchuu Shinpi Boogie (宇宙神秘ブギ)" by Riinu (Strawberry Prince) [莉犬 (すとぷり)] (eps 47-51) 11: "YSP!" by King Cream Soda (キング・クリームソーダ) (eps 53-62) 1: "Umarekawattemo (生まれ変わっても)" by Kana Nozomihara (Kana Hanazawa) (eps 1) 2: "Y-Gakuen e Ikou Waiwai-hen (Y学園へ行こう ワイワイ編)" by Lon (ろん) (eps 2, 6, 11, 17, 22, 28, 33) 3: "Y-Gakuen e Ikou Shisou-hen (Y学園へ行こう 疾走編)" by 96neko (96猫) (eps 3, 7, 12, 18, 23, 29, 36) 4: "Y-Gakuen e Ikou Seishun Rock-hen (Y学園へ行こう 青春ロック編)" by α/Arukifakyun (+α/あるふぁきゅん。) (eps 4, 9, 13, 19, 26) 5: "Y-Gakuen e Ikou Gakuen Dotabata-hen (Y学園へ行こう 学園ドタバタ編)" by Riinu (Strawberry Prince) [莉犬 (すとぷり)] (eps 5, 10, 15, 21, 24, 30, 32) 6: "Return to Chikyuu (リターントゥ地球)" by Haruka Tomatsu (eps 8, 16, 25, 35, 38) 7: "Y Gakuen e Ikou 8bit-hen (Y学園へ行こう 8bit編)" by Soraru (eps 14, 20, 27, 31) 8: "Shinryaku Mashoujo Eruzemekia (侵略魔少女エルゼメキア)" by Eruzemekia (P Maru-sama.) [エルゼメキア (P丸様。)] (eps 34) 9: "Kiraboshi Kyouwakoku Kokka (キラボシ共和国国歌)" by Sona Yamamoto, Hana Kogane, Tamaki Kumata, Kenshin Kobayashi and Dazaifu Housewife Choir "ODEN" (eps 39-41)

Reviews

Well, It's not really the best anime out there but it's what you can expect from an anime for children.

Here we have a new take on the Yo-kai watch franchise now they are Henshin Heroes and that's awesome, the story ... well, don't expect too much and also is full of silly humor like butt jokes and similar.

On the other hand, the music is totally amazing. They have like 5 endings that shuffle between them every episode and both openings are really good (specially the first one).

I'll say that it is the kind of anime that you leave playing in the background and then come ... back to really pay attention to the transformations and the music.

Reviewer’s Rating: 8

I'm certainly tired of Yo-kai Watch trying to get attention from other grown-ups especially with teens and such what. Shadowside is good enough with:

- The Stories is some episodes good compared to the original, having a more darker tone in this series.

- The 5th movie, Forever Friends is good similar to the anime and the only good movie in the Yo-kai Watch series

- Like the Yo-kais during the future timeline compared to original, as they have the ability to transform into their Shadowside form.

Compared to Shadowside, Yo-kai Watch had once again copied the notes from other series like they copied from ... Digimon (Having creatures transform) and this time, they copied from My Hero Academia. I mean the opening of the series is good. But there are many issues with the anime.

- Jiba Jinpei, the main character looks like Jibanyan fusing with Boruto Uzumaki from the series of the same name to have a bratty personality. Their voice looks almost the same but different voice actors.

- All of Jiba's forms look like they are made from Sonic the Hedgehog especially the comics; anthropomorphic cat forms with connected eyes like Sonic. Even his main form looks like Jibanyan as a Sonic character.

- They used My Hero Academia overall for everything in the series to mix it with the Yo-kai Watch series. Even some filler episodes are getting way boring similar to the original.

- Some people would not like the idea that they turn them to humans. Probably except for Komasan & some human based Yo-kai like Fubiki-Hime.

Whisper turned into a antagonist and he's even more weird.

The only good thing about the series is that:

- The fights from the 6th Movie is good, similar to Pokemon XY.

- The only character from the previous series to return is Enma-Daio. Other human characters from the previous series came back as minor characters (But different characters) like Keisuke Amano from Shadowside.

- The series is connected to the previous Yo-kai Watch Series due to Soranaki, the main antagonist from Shadowside & made a comeback to the original.

Reviewer’s Rating: 4
